1.title: Heat
1.description: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

2.title: Nightcrawler
2.description: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

3.title: Attack on Titan: The Final Season - The Last Attack
3.description: The final battle for humanity's survival against the Titans reaches its climax.

4.title: Goodfellas
4.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

5.title: Prisoners
5.description: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

6.title: Drive
6.description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

7.title: Manchester by the Sea
7.description: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

8.title: Wall-E
8.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

9.title: The Godfather Part II
9.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

10.title: Fight Club
10.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

11.title: Pulp Fiction
11.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

12.title: Snatch
12.description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

13.title: Fury
13.description: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

14.title: Ratatouille
14.description: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

15.title: Spirited Away
15.description: A young girl, Chihiro, becomes trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation, she must call upon the courage she never knew she had to free her family.

16.title: Training Day
16.description: On his first day on the job as a Los Angeles narcotics officer, a rookie cop goes beyond a full work day in training within the narcotics division of the LAPD with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

17.title: A Silent Voice
17.description: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

18.title: Inglourious Basterds
18.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

19.title: Se7en
19.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

20.title: The Social Network
20.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

21.title: Before Sunrise
21.description: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

22.title: Gone Girl
22.description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

23.title: American History X
23.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

24.title: Howl's Moving Castle
24.description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

25.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
25.description: A couple undergoes a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

26.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
26.description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

27.title: Blade Runner 2049
27.description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

28.title: Taxi Driver
28.description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

29.title: The Irishman
29.description: Hitman Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family in this acclaimed film from Martin Scorsese.

30.title: Interstellar
30.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

31.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
31.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

32.title: The Dark Knight
32.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

33.title: Her
33.description: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

34.title: My Cousin Vinny
34.description: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.

35.title: Joker
35.description: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure.

36.title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
36.description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

37.title: The Departed
37.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

38.title: Casino
38.description: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive, compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast living and fast loving socialite.

39.title: Dog Day Afternoon
39.description: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation, which turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

40.title: Your Name
40.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

41.title: Insomnia
41.description: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

42.title: John Wick
42.description: Ex-hitman John Wick comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that took everything from him.

43.title: Monsters, Inc.
43.description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

44.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
44.description: Harry, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts for another magic-filled year. Harry comes face to face with danger yet again, this time in the form of escaped convict, Sirius Black.

45.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
45.description: As a wild stallion travels across the frontiers of the Old West, he befriends a young human and finds true love with a mare.

46.title: The Shawshank Redemption
46.description: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison.

47.title: Léon: The Professional
47.description: Léon, the top hit man in New York, has earned a rep as an effective cleaner. But after his next-door neighbors are wiped out by a loose-cannon DEA agent.

48.title: Ronin
48.description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

49.title: Shutter Island
49.description: World War II soldier-turned-U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a patient from a hospital for the criminally insane.

50.title: Django Unchained
50.description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

51.title: The Revenant
51.description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

52.title: Inside Out
52.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

53.title: Hacksaw Ridge
53.description: WWII American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first Conscientious Objector in American history to receive the Congressional Medal of Honor.

54.title: The Great Gatsby
54.description: A writer and wall street trader, Nick Carraway, finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

55.title: Inception
55.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

56.title: The Batman
56.description: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

57.title: Little Miss Sunshine
57.description: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

58.title: Beautiful Boy
58.description: A father's desperate attempts to help his son overcome his methamphetamine addiction.

59.title: The Big Short
59.description: Four denizens in the world of high-finance predict the credit and housing bubble collapse of the mid-2000s, and decide to take on the big banks for their greed and lack of foresight.

60.title: The Nice Guys
60.description: A private eye investigates the apparent suicide of a fading porn star in 1970s Los Angeles and uncovers a conspiracy.
